member.name: T:Bridge.Car
member.summary: represents a car that can cross a bridge

member.name: M:Bridge.Vehicle.BasePrice
member.summary: Abstract method to return the base price before discounts.

member.name: M:Bridge.Vehicle.Price
member.summary: Abstract method to return the final price with discounts applied. Each vehicle must implement this method.

member.name: M:Bridge.Vehicle.VehicleType
member.summary: Abstract method to return the vehicle type. Each vehicle must implement this method.
